c74object.name: velkey
c74object.digest: Add velocity sensitivity with keypress audio
c74object.description: Uses the sound of keyprresses to add velocity sensitivity to MIDI notes.

inlet.description: MIDI note velocity, non-zero for note-on, 0 for note-off.

objarg.name: sensitivity
objarg.digest: Sets the sensitivity of the keyboard
objarg.description: Sets the sensitivity of the keyboard. 0 uses the raw kaypress amplitude leves, positive number increase the sensitivity and negative numbers decrease it.

objarg.name: gain
objarg.description: A number to be mutiplied with the velocity, equivelent of multiplying a gain value with the keypress sound signal.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Signal containing the sound of the keypresses
method.description: Signal containing the sound of the keypresses.

method.name: in1
method.description: Non-zero for note-on, zero for note-on.

attribute.name: sensitivity
attribute.digest: Sets the sensitivity of the keyboard
attribute.description: Sets the sensitivity of the keyboard. 0 uses the raw kaypress amplitude leves, positive number increase the sensitivity and negative numbers decrease it.

attribute.name: gain
attribute.description: A number to be mutiplied with the velocity, equivelent of multiplying a gain value with the keypress sound signal.
